meanings.definition: A lipid containing a phosphate group in its molecule, especially a compound present in cell membranes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study phospholipids to understand cell structures better.
meanings.sent3: The phospholipids in the cell membrane were having a party, dancing around.
meanings.sent4: The phospholipids acted as the gatekeepers of the cell, allowing only specific molecules to enter.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, phospholipids look like tiny building blocks holding cells together.
